problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,AD⊥BC于点D,BD=CD,若BC=5,AD=4,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AD ⊥ BC is at point D, BD = CD, if BC = N_0, AD = N_1, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:根据题意,阴影部分的面积为三角形面积的一半,∵S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}×BC•AD=\frac{1}{2}×4×5=10,∴阴影部分面积=\frac{1}{2}×10=5．故选:A．
